plot: Veronica uncovers a major secret about her father; Betty and Archie's vow to take down the Black Hood once and for all leads to a dangerous showdown.

Betty and Archie are concerned when Mr. Svensen doesn't show up to work. After discovering that he has been abducted by the Black Hood, they race against time to save his life and unmask the killer. As tensions mount between Jughead and his father, he steps up to end Penny's reign of terror. Veronica gets a peek behind the curtain of her father's empire. Fred receives a hefty medical bill. Penelope tells Cheryl that they can not afford Christmas this year.—snowflakeaudrey
